query.statement:
SELECT 0 AS CHK, T.PSPID, T.POSID, T.ZSITE_NM, T.ZSPEC1, T.ZSPEC2, T.STATE, T.INSLFN, T.GBN , T.INSLFN_NM, T.WRKLFN, T.WRKLFN_NM, T.MWBTR, T.CNFDT, T.ZFDAT, T.BLDAT, '' AS LIFNR, T.TEXT30, T.CHARACTERISTIC , T.VALUE , T.IN_GBN ,T.ECKEY ,T.CONF FROM (SELECT A.MANDT, A.PSPID, A.POSID, B.ZSITE_NM, C.ZSPEC1, C.ZSPEC2, A.STATE, A.INSLFN, A.GBN , (SELECT X.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.LIFNR = A.INSLFN) AS INSLFN_NM, A.WRKLFN, (SELECT X.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.LIFNR = A.WRKLFN) AS WRKLFN_NM, (A.MWBTR * 100) AS MWBTR, D.MDATE AS CNFDT, CASE WHEN CAST(A.BLDAT AS INT) <= 20160331 AND CAST(A.BLDAT AS INT) <> 0 THEN D.MDATE ELSE A.ZFDAT END ZFDAT, A.BLDAT,
C.TEXT30 , F.CHARACTERISTIC , F.VALUE ,A.ECKEY ,A.CONF ,(SELECT X.GBN FROM SAPHEE.ZTBEVADF1 AS X WHERE A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND SUBSTR(A.ECKEY,1,6) = X.YYM AND SUBSTR(A.ECKEY,7,2) = X.TYP AND SUBSTR(A.ECKEY,9,4) = X.SNO) AS IN_GBN FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1401 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.PSPID = C.POSID AND A.POSID = C.POSID_1
-- INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0207 AS D LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0207 AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.PSPID = D.PSPID AND A.POSID = D.POSID AND D.GUBUN = 'A'
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS F ON A.MANDT = F.MANDT AND A.POSID = F.HOGI AND F.CHARACTERISTIC in ( 'EL_DREUSE' , 'EL_DKEY') -- 철거비 특성값 --AND F.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ACD1' AND F.SEQ = ( SELECT MAX(X.SEQ) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = F.MANDT AND X.HOGI = F.HOGI AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = F.CHARACTERISTIC)
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
--AND (C.ZZSHIP1 BETWEEN #ZZSHIPF# AND #ZZSHIPT#)
AND (C.ZZSHIP1 BETWEEN #ZZSHIPF# AND #ZZSHIPT#)
AND (A.BLDAT BETWEEN #ZZSHIPF# AND #ZZSHIPT#)
AND A.STATE = #STATE2# AND A.GBN = 'G' -- AND A.CONF = 'X' -- AND A.ECKEY <>''
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# -- AND (A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#)
AND A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR# -- 신청업체 기준으로 조회 (고희수 sw요청)
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# -- AND (A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#)
AND A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR# -- 신청업체 기준으로 조회 (고희수 sw요청)
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# -- AND (A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#)
AND A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR# -- 신청업체 기준으로 조회 (고희수 sw요청)
AND A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# AND A.PSPID = #PSPID# -- AND (A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#)
AND A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR# -- 신청업체 기준으로 조회 (고희수 sw요청) AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# -- AND (A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#)
AND A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR# -- 신청업체 기준으로 조회 (고희수 sw요청)
AND C.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
) AS T WHERE T.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND T.VALUE = 'Y'
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
